faqs.question: How quickly can I see improvement?
faqs.answer: Our studies show that students who use StudyBuddy consistently see an improvement in their maths grades within 2-4 weeks.

faqs.question: What if I'm really behind?
faqs.answer: Don't worry, our AI tutor can help you catch up quickly. We work with students at any level, from struggling to excelling.

faqs.answer: Yes, it is. We offer a free trial, and you can start using StudyBuddy without any credit card details.
